collection:
This policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard
your information.

Data Collection and Use 

We collect personal data such as your menstrual cycle dates, symptoms, and
product preferences.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies 

Our landing page website uses cookies to improve user experience.
sharing: We do not sell your personal information.

Data may
be shared with third parties only when necessary for service provision (e.g.,
cloud hosting) and in compliance with legal obligations.
